title: Chiefs In Politics Is Nothing New They Are Opportunists- Mahama Don't Even Trust Them  Karbo
text: A deputy communications director of the opposition New Patriotic Party ( NPP ), Anthony Abayifaa Karbo has described chiefs who engage themselves in active politics as “opportunists”. According to him, their involvement in politics is not
